mdRecord.dcterms:description: ...a reconstructed composite of European manor houses that have been disassembled, cased, shipped, and creatively reassembled in their new American setting....it is a composite of three structures... Thomas Hawkins Priory, Warwickshire, Wormleighton Manor, and Sulgrave Manor. (National Register of Historic Places Registration Form) [work]
